title: Returning to League (Looking to play with friendly peeps)
body:
Hello lovely people,

I was on hiatus with the game for about 3-4 months and I'm looking to get back into it. Looking to play with someone friendly players and make some friends online. My username is Park Chanyeol (obvs) and my discord is - Tundradragon#6401. And here's my discord server for in game communicaton - https://discord.gg/uKeP4VX 

Have a lovely day my friends and can't wait to play with those who wish to add me.
